DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine behavioral and functional brain changes occuring as a result of cognitive remediation training in patients with schizophrenia. Extension and specificity of related changes will also be examined.
DOC.brief_title: Functional Neuroimaging Effects of Cognitive Remediation Training
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder Stable outpatient Current drug abuse or dependence History of neurological damage, disorder, or disease
